burlington.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old North End, South End, Hill Section, New North End
burlington.meetingHighlights: Active student and evening meetings near the university; outdoor summer meetings and strong newcomers' support.
burlington.transitInfo: Green Mountain Transit provides local bus service; Burlington International Airport offers regional flights.

south-burlington.meetingHighlights: Suburban daytime and evening meetings, family-friendly formats common.
south-burlington.transitInfo: Served by Green Mountain Transit; short drive to Burlington and Burlington International Airport.

montpelier.meetingHighlights: Small but consistent meetings with strong civic engagement and midday groups for state employees.
montpelier.transitInfo: Bus service connects to regional towns; most attendees drive from surrounding communities.

rutland.meetingHighlights: Evening and recovery-focused meetings; steady local fellowship.
rutland.transitInfo: Local bus service and proximity to US-4; regional airport connections via Burlington.

barre.meetingHighlights: Community-based evening meetings with strong local sponsor networks.
barre.transitInfo: Regional bus links and drive access from Montpelier and surrounding towns.
